ClassDesc: Callback interface for action modes. Supplied to @B_android#support#v7#app#AppCompatDelegate#startSupportActionMode_E@ (Callback)}, a Callback configures and handles events raised by a user's interaction with an action mode. An action mode's lifecycle is as follows: @B_android#support#v7#view#ActionMode#Callback#onCreateActionMode_E@ once on initial creation @B_android#support#v7#view#ActionMode#Callback#onPrepareActionMode_E@ after creation and any time the @B_android#support#v7#view#ActionMode_E@ is invalidated @B_android#support#v7#view#ActionMode#Callback#onActionItemClicked_E@ any time a contextual action button is clicked @B_android#support#v7#view#ActionMode#Callback#onDestroyActionMode_E@ when the action mode is closed
